official_title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to confer exclusive Federal appellate jurisdiction, with respect to State cases involving the death penalty, upon the United States Supreme Court.

summary.text: Grants exclusive Federal appellate jurisdiction, with regard to State cases involving the death penalty, to the U.S. Supreme Court.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to confer exclusive Federal appellate jurisdiction, with respect to State cases involving the death penalty, upon the United States Supreme Court.
